text: "Ace of Spades" is a 1980 song by British heavy metal band Motörhead and taken from their fourth studio album of the same name. It went to number 15 in the United Kingdom in 1980 and number 9 in the United Kingdom in 2016 following Lemmy's death from prostate cancer. ==Live version== "Ace of Spades" was recorded live in 1988 by British heavy metal band Motörhead. It was taken from their live album No Sleep at All. Category:1980 songs Category:Motörhead songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Ace of Spades (song)
